detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract OwnedUpgradeabilityProxy (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BLOT.sol#734-799) has payable functions:
	 - Proxy.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BLOT.sol#641-656)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
